description: Nathan couldn't be with his loved one on Valentine's day. As he got home after his gym routine, he picked up his cellphone and noticed an incoming message. It was his girlfriend's boss. He was telling Nathan that he was thinking about giving her a raise but needed a little convincing. Nathan knew that he had a big crush on him, so he gave him a good reason to proceed. His girlfriend's salary is not the only thing that got a raise...
title: Valentine For GF's Boss, Scene #01
